column1: # HACK: Some fields are prepended by an invisible character (https://invisible-characters.com/00AD-SOFT-HYPHEN.html) in order to get the explorer to display the options in the correct order.

column2: Explore the world's political systems with the leading approaches of measuring democracy. Download the complete [Democracy Data](https://github.com/owid/notebooks/tree/main/BastianHerre/democracy).
